page.title: 06PENNYCROSS
page.content:
Half a street! Melrose Avenue in 1947 struggling to join a horse-shoe shape with its neighbour,Fountains Crescent.
Few car owners; and the nearest buses travelling through Ham Drive (once Ham Lane):twenty minutes to "town";and the fare just 2\d!
Children played on Beacon "Downs", (before the half completed road was extended to link Pennycross and Beacon Park) climbing piles of rubble;and scrabbling over the abandoned stream- roller that seemed to stand forever in the mud of Merrivale "Road".
Cont.
